pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - MosaicMarlin Hotel Resort and Casino MosaicMarlin HOME ABOUT US Casino Contact Your Privacy Policy MosaicMarlin Hotel Resort and Casino is committed to protecting the privacy of our users. We understand that you care about how your information is used and we respect your privacy. Information We Gather We only collect personal information that is essential to provide you with the services you request. We collect this information with your consent and transparency, letting you know why it's needed and how it will be used. Automatic Data Collection Similar to most websites, our servers gather information that your browser transmits during your visit ("Log Data"). This Log Data may include details like your device's IP address, browser type and version, the pages you access on our website, your visit time and duration, and other relevant statistics. Cookies and Tracking Technologies We use cookies, small data files that may contain an anonymous unique identifier, to collect information. Cookies are sent from our website and stored on your device. Like many sites, cookies allow us to gather information. You can instruct your browser to block all cookies or notify you when a cookie is sent. However, please be aware that some parts of our website might not function properly if you disable cookies. Security Measures We take the security of your personal information seriously. While no online transmission or electronic storage method is completely secure, we employ commercially accepted practices to protect your data. However, we cannot guarantee absolute security. Updates to this Policy We may update our Privacy Policy occasionally. We will notify you of any changes by posting the revised Privacy Policy on this page. We recommend reviewing this policy periodically to stay informed about any updates. Changes become effective when posted on this page. The MosaicMarlin Tea website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline MosaicMarlin Explore our rooms and elevate your luxury stay.
